Our class carried out a survey of the children in Coed Eva Junior School ab out Fairwater Leisure Centre which is attached to our local Comprehensive Sc hool.Nearly all the of the children in our school use the centre fairly often .Over a third of the children in schoo l use it more than once a week.The most popular feature of the centre is without doubt the swimming pool,which is used by everyone who visits the cen tre.All in all,the children are very proud of their centre and use it a lot
